title: Police: Pregnant teen shot in the face in San Antonio
content:
SAN ANTONIO — A pregnant teenager was shot in the face early Thursday morning at a home on the city's Northwest Side.
Police say they were called to the home on the 12,100 block of Pebble Lane at about 5 a.m. where they found the victim, later identified as 17-year-old Ariel Guerra, suffering from a gunshot wound to the face.
Guerra was taken to University Hospital in critical condition.
Investigators said they are questioning a male who also lives at the home. A weapon was also recovered at the scene. No other information was provided.
